messages.body: How do I customize the email templates for order confirmations?

Hello,

You can customize your email templates in the Email Settings section of your dashboard. We offer several variables you can use to personalize the emails, such as {{customer_name}}, {{order_number}}, and {{product_name}}. You can also add your own branding elements and custom messages.

Would you like me to walk you through the specific steps or share some template examples?

Best regards,
Emma
